org.dgfoundation.amp.nireports.behaviours

Class AbstractComputedBehaviour<V extends NiAmountCell>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.dgfoundation.amp.nireports.behaviours.AbstractComputedBehaviour<V>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Behaviour<V>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AverageAmountBehaviour, ForecastExecutionRateBehaviour, FormulaAverageBehaviour, FormulaicAmountBehaviour, VarianceMeasureBehaviour

    public abstract class AbstractComputedBehaviour<V extends NiAmountCell>
extends java.lang.Object
implements Behaviour<V>
    the abstract behaviour of a computed measure/column. Defines all the common behaviour so that subclasses can focus on implementing the business logic

        Description copied from interface: Behaviour
